StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetCandidateAssignedProgramQSNData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@NWAID int AS
SELECT C.CONTRACT_ID, C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, C.COMPONENT_CODE, MC.GENDER_CODE AS GENDER, ISNULL(PA.PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, 0) AS PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY_ID, ISNULL((SELECT PG.PROGRAM_CODE + SPACE(1) + PG.PROGRAM_DESCRIPTION FROM PROGRAM PG WHERE PG.PROGRAM_ID = PA.PROGRAM_ID), '') AS PROGRAM, ISNULL(QSN.QSN_ID, '') AS QSN FROM CONTRACT C INNER JOIN NWA ON C.NWA_ID = NWA.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON NWA.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PROGRAM_AVAILABILITY PA ON C.CONTRACT_ID = PA.CONTRACT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN QSN ON C.CONTRACT_ID = QSN.CONTRACT_ID WHERE NWA.NWA_ID = @NWAID
